speaker: Eric
text: Hi, I am Eric. I am a built-in voice, and you just generated me! Welcome to your new creative suite.

speaker: Eric
text: Take a look at the Session History panel on the right. You will see my takes appearing there in real-time.

speaker: Eric
text: In that history list, you can replay, delete, or even convert files to M P 3. Every line you make is automatically logged there.

speaker: Eric
text: It's now your turn to try. Click the 'Clear All' button in the toolbar above, then load 'Tutorial_02_UI_Overview' from the tutorials folder, and click 'Run Scene' to see how to navigate the app.
